Class AbstractModule

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.jpac.AbstractModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Module, SimulationModule
public abstract class AbstractModule
extends java.lang.Thread

base class of elbfisch modules

Constructor Detail

AbstractModule

public AbstractModule(AbstractModule containingModule,
                      java.lang.String name)
used to construct a module

Parameters:
containingModule - null : module is the top most module, which by definition must contain all other modules of the application. <>null: module, which instantiated this module and therefor is the containing module
name: - the short name of the module. This name will be supplemented by the name of all containing module in a given hierarchical order

AbstractModule

public AbstractModule(AbstractModule containingModule)
used to construct a module. It receives the name of it's class

Parameters:
containingModule - the containing (instantiating module) if null, the module is the top most module, which by definition must contain all other modules of the application
Method Detail

init

protected final void init()

run

public void run()
is not called directly by an elbfisch application

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

shutdown

public void shutdown(int exitCode)
              throws ProcessException
used to shutdown the the elbfisch application. If called by one of the modules, every module will receive a ShutdownRequestedException in the next following cycle.

Parameters:
exitCode - exit code returned to the system (OS)
Throws:
ProcessException - thrown, if an elbfisch specific condition arises

work

protected abstract void work()
                      throws ProcessException
central working method of the module. All real time actions of the module are implemented herein.

Throws:
ProcessException - if an arising process exception is not handled by the application of work(), the module will stop running and perform some default handling

toString in class java.lang.Thread

preCheckInterlocks

protected abstract void preCheckInterlocks()
                                    throws InputInterlockException
Is used to check if pre conditions before invoking await() are fulfilled. Is called, whenever a module returns from ProcessEvent.await().

Throws:
InputInterlockException - will be thrown by ProcessEvent.await(), if an interlock violation occurs

postCheckInterlocks

protected abstract void postCheckInterlocks()
                                     throws OutputInterlockException
Is used to check if all post conditions are fulfilled when calling a ProcessEvent.await()

Throws:
OutputInterlockException - will be thrown by ProcessEvent.await(), if an interlock violation occurs

public int getModuleIndex()

public void setDebugIndex(int index)

getDebugIndex

public int getDebugIndex()

start

public void start()
used to start a module. Before starting itself it starts all containing modules

start in class java.lang.Thread

isRequestingEmergencyStop

public boolean isRequestingEmergencyStop()

enableCyclicTasks

protected void enableCyclicTasks(boolean enable)

inEveryCycleDo

protected abstract void inEveryCycleDo()
                                throws ProcessException
is invoked by jPac in every cycle to let it handle application specific code, which must be run continously. the application code inside inEveryCycleDo() is stateless. It must not contain any ProcessEvent.await() calls.

Throws:
ProcessException
